WRITING.TEXT: Thanks for the advice; I really appreciate it. I'm going to try to set up an appointment with a doctor/ diatician to get back to a healthy state. I'm slowly coming to the realization that I started working out to get healthy and stay that way. Even though I think I look good, doesn't mean I'm as healthy as I should be.
Thanks for the article as it perfectly describes my situation and brings some much needed perspective.

This is extremely helpful, thank you!! It sounds like we have almost the exact same situation, because I too haven't been hungry though it's apparently not enough food. That part was especially confusing for me because I figured if my body were truly starving, I would feel it.
